audioText: Le comité scientifique décidera demain si cette avance technologique révolutionnaire justifie un investissement supplémentaire de plusieurs millions d'euros.
question: What will the scientific committee decide tomorrow?
options: Whether this revolutionary technological advance justifies additional investment of several million euros
Whether to publish the research results in international journals
Whether to patent the invention before competitors discover it
Whether to form partnerships with other research institutions
explanation: The text states 'Le comité scientifique décidera demain si cette avance technologique révolutionnaire justifie un investissement supplémentaire de plusieurs millions d'euros' - The scientific committee will decide tomorrow whether this revolutionary technological advance justifies additional investment of several million euros. 'Avance' means advance/progress, and 'décidera' is the future tense of 'décider'.
